answerList: In the program below, if the right button is pressed, Thymio's top LEDs' color won't change to orange if the middle sensor in front is covered.
In the program on top, if Thymio's middle sensor in front is covered, his top LEDs' color won't change to light blue if the right button is pressed.
In the program below, if Thymio's middle sensor in front is covered, his top LEDs' color won't change to light blue if the right button is pressed.
In the program on top, Thymio can onlly change his top LEDs' color to orange and in the program below only to light blue.
In the program on top, Thymio can only change his top LEDs' color to light blue and in the program below only to orange.
